item.title: frpçš„ä½¿ç”¨
item.description:
1 What is frp? ï¼ˆæ‘˜è‡ªé¡¹ç›®READMEï¼‰

frp is a fast reverse proxy to help you expose a local server behind a NAT or firewall to the Internet. As of now, it supports TCP and UDP, as well as HTTP and HTTPS protocols, where requests can be forwarded to internal services by domain name.

frpé¡¹ç›®åœ°å€ï¼šhttps://github.com/fatedier/frp

2 æ³¨ï¼šæœ¬æ–‡æ˜¯åŸºäºlinuxçš„é…ç½®

release: https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases

3 æ— stcpï¼š

Serverï¼š frps.ini

[common]
bind_port = 7000 # Clientå’ŒServeré€šä¿¡çš„ç«¯å£
run the server:
./frps -c ./frps.ini
Clientï¼š
frpc.inié…ç½®
[common]
server_addr = aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd # Serverçš„ipåœ°å€
server_port = 7000 # Clientå’ŒServeré€šä¿¡çš„ç«¯å£
[tcp_port]
type = tcp
local_ip = 127.0.0.1
local_port = 6006 # ClientæœåŠ¡çš„ç«¯å£
remote_port = 6006 # Serveræš´éœ²çš„ç«¯å£

run the Client: ./frpc -c ./frpc.ini

4 æœ‰stcpï¼š

å…·ä½“é€»è¾‘ï¼šClientç«¯1â€“>frpsâ€“>Clientç«¯2ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºå…¬ç½‘æœåŠ¡å™¨å……å½“äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåª’ä»‹ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œæˆ‘åœ¨Client1å¼€å¯äº†tensorboardï¼Œç«¯å£æ˜¯6006ã€‚é€šè¿‡å…¬ç½‘æœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œæˆ‘å¯ä»¥åœ¨æœ¬åœ°çš„ç”µè„‘ä¸Šè®¿é—®å¤„äºå†…ç½‘çš„Client1çš„6006ç«¯å£ã€‚

4.1

Serverï¼š frps.ini

[common]
bind_port = 7000

run the server: ./frps -c ./frps.ini

4.2

Client1ï¼š frpc.ini

[common]
server_addr = aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd # Serverçš„ipåœ°å€
server_port = 7000
[secret_tcp]
# If the type is secret tcp, remote_port is useless
# Who want to connect local port should deploy another frpc with stcp proxy and role is visitor
type = stcp
# sk used for authentication for visitors
sk = abcdefg # skè¦å’ŒClient2ç›¸åŒ
local_ip = 127.0.0.1 # Client1çš„è®¿é—®åœ°å€
local_port = 6006 # Client1çš„è®¿é—®ç«¯å£
use_encryption = false
use_compression = false

run the Client1: ./frpc -c ./frpc.ini

4.3

Client2ï¼š frpc.ini

[common]
server_addr = aaa.bbb.ccc.ddd
server_port = 7000
# user of frpc should be same in both stcp server and stcp visitor
[secret_tcp_visitor]
# frpc role visitor -> frps -> frpc role server
role = visitor
type = stcp
# the server name you want to visitor
server_name = secret_tcp
sk = abcdefg # skè¦å’ŒClient1ç›¸åŒ
# connect this address to visitor stcp server
bind_addr = 127.0.0.1 # Client2çš„è®¿é—®åœ°å€
bind_port = 6006 # Client2çš„è®¿é—®ç«¯å£
use_encryption = false
use_compression = false

run the Client2: ./frpc -c ./frpc.ini

5 å…¶ä»–å°çš„ç»†èŠ‚

5.1 å¦‚æœå‡ºç°ä¸‹è¿°é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„é˜²ç«å¢™æ²¡æœ‰å…³é—­ï¼ˆä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„å®‰å…¨ç»„æ²¡æœ‰è®¾ç½®ï¼‰ï¼š

5.2 é˜²ç«å¢™çš„ç›¸å…³å‘½ä»¤

æŸ¥çœ‹çŠ¶æ€ï¼š# systemctl status firewalld æˆ–è€… firewall-cmd â€“state
åœæ­¢ï¼š# systemctl disable firewalld

é‡å¯ï¼š#systemctl restart firewalld
æ°¸ä¹…çš„å¼€æ”¾éœ€è¦çš„ç«¯å£
